resources.string: "MARATHA VYAVSAYIK UDYOJAK" Business Application is Specialized for MARATHA Community to grow Enterprenuer Relationship
* Grow your Business through maximum Customer Viewers \n \n * Easy finding your Business details

* This app valid for "MARATHA" Community Business 
Enterprenuer
 
 * Registration of Business Enterprenuer Required Cast Certificate/Birth Certificate/Leaving Certificate
 
 * Registration cost of Business Enterprenuer is Rs 200 per year
 
 * Transfer your Registration amount to following Account Details
